SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhir

Interface TerminologyClient

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
public interface TerminologyClient extends Closeable
The client interface to FHIR terminology operations.
Author:
John Grimes, Piotr Szul

      @Nonnull Parameters validateCode(@Nonnull UriType url, @Nonnull UriType system, @Nullable StringType version, @Nonnull CodeType code)
      Validates a code against a value set.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the value set to validate against
      system - the system of the code to validate
      version - the version of the code system to validate against
      code - the code to validate
      Returns:
      a Parameters resource
      See Also:
      • ValueSet/$validate-code

    • translate

      @Nonnull Parameters translate(@Nonnull UriType url, @Nonnull UriType system, @Nullable StringType version, @Nonnull CodeType code, @Nullable BooleanType reverse, @Nullable UriType target)
      Translates a code using a concept map.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the concept map to use for translation
      system - the system of the code to translate
      version - the version of the code system to translate from
      code - the code to translate
      reverse - if true, the translation will be reversed
      target - the URL of the value set within which the translation is sought
      Returns:
      a Parameters resource
      See Also:
      • ConceptMap/$translate

    • buildTranslate

      @Nonnull IOperationUntypedWithInput<Parameters> buildTranslate(@Nonnull UriType url, @Nonnull UriType system, @Nullable StringType version, @Nonnull CodeType code, @Nullable BooleanType reverse, @Nullable UriType target)
      Builds a translate operation that can be customized and executed later.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the concept map to use for translation
      system - the system of the code to translate
      version - the version of the code system to translate from
      code - the code to translate
      reverse - if true, the translation will be reversed
      target - the URL of the value set within which the translation is sought
      Returns:
      an IOperationUntypedWithInput that can be customized and executed later

    • subsumes

      @Nonnull Parameters subsumes(@Nonnull CodeType codeA, @Nonnull CodeType codeB, @Nonnull UriType system, @Nullable StringType version)
      Tests whether one code subsumes another.
      Parameters:
      codeA - the code that will be tested to check if it subsumes codeB
      codeB - the code that will be tested to check if it is subsumed by codeA
      system - the system of the codes being tested
      version - the version of the code system that the codes are from
      Returns:
      a Parameters resource
      See Also:
      • CodeSystem/$subsumes

    • lookup

      @Nonnull Parameters lookup(@Nonnull UriType system, @Nullable StringType version, @Nonnull CodeType code, @Nullable CodeType property, @Nullable StringType acceptLanguage)
      Looks up properties and designations for a code.
      Parameters:
      system - the system of the code
      version - the version of the code system
      code - the code to lookup
      property - the property or properties to be returned to the response
      acceptLanguage - the preferred language for the localizable return values
      Returns:
      a Parameters resource
      See Also:
      • CodeSystem/$lookup

    • buildLookup

      @Nonnull IOperationUntypedWithInput<Parameters> buildLookup(@Nonnull UriType system, @Nullable StringType version, @Nonnull CodeType code, @Nullable CodeType property, @Nullable StringType acceptLanguage)
      Builds a lookup operation that can be customized and executed later.
      Parameters:
      system - the system of the code
      version - the version of the code system
      code - the code to lookup
      property - the property or properties to be returned in the response
      acceptLanguage - the preferred language for the localizable return values
      Returns:
      an IOperationUntypedWithInput that can be customized and executed later
      See Also:
      • CodeSystem/$lookup

    • build

      static TerminologyClient build(@Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext, @Nonnull TerminologyConfiguration terminologyConfiguration, @Nonnull org.apache.http.client.HttpClient httpClient)
      Builds a new terminology client.
      Parameters:
      fhirContext - the FHIR context to use for building the client
      terminologyConfiguration - a TerminologyConfiguration to govern the behaviour of the client
      httpClient - the HttpClient instance to use for making HTTP requests
      Returns:
      the new instance of TerminologyClient
